Package org.lwjgl.egl

Class EGL10

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.egl.EGL10
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EGL11
    public class EGL10
extends java.lang.Object
    The core EGL 1.0 functionality.
